name: echo-bot-ts
description: An example LINE bot with TypeScript made to echo messages. I then studied a weather API tutorial and combined the two to make my own unique responses. Roy Kibet- https://www.section.io/engineering-education/create-a-weather-app-in-nodejs-using-openweathermap-api/#prerequisites
author: Nicholas Dwiarto <nicholasdwiarto@yahoo.com> (https://nicholasdw.com), Roy Kibet tutorial and my own spin off this for learning purposes-Matt Crowe
